com.shopify.buy.model

Class Cart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shopify.buy.model.Cart

  • public class Cart
extends java.lang.Object
    The Cart is the starting point for the Checkout API. You are responsible for building a cart, then transforming it into a Checkout using the BuyClient.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cart()

      Adds a ProductVariant to the cart.

      Removes all line items from the cart.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cart

        public Cart()

    • Method Detail

      • addVariant

        public void addVariant(ProductVariant variant)
        Adds a ProductVariant to the cart. If a LineItem with this ProductVariant already exists in the Cart, that LineItems's quantity is increased by one.
        Parameters:
        variant - the ProductVariant to add to the cart

      • decrementVariant

        public void decrementVariant(ProductVariant variant)
        If the cart contains a LineItem matching the ProductVariant, its quantity is decremented by 1. If the LineItem's quantity is decremented to 0, it is removed from the cart.
        Parameters:
        variant - the ProductVariant to decrement

      • setVariantQuantity

        public void setVariantQuantity(ProductVariant variant,
                               int quantity)
        Sets the quantity of a ProductVariant in the cart. If a LineItem with this ProductVariant already exists in the Cart, that LineItems's quantity will be set to the new value. If no LineItem with this ProductVariant exists in the Cart, a new LineItem will be created with the specified ProductVariant and quantity.
        Parameters:
        variant - the ProductVariant to update
        quantity - the new quantity

      • getLineItems

        public java.util.List<CartLineItem> getLineItems()
        Returns:
        The list of CartLineItem objects in the cart. Note that these are different from LineItem objects in that they include the ProductVariant.

      • getProductVariant

        public ProductVariant getProductVariant(LineItem lineItem)
        Parameters:
        lineItem - The LineItem containing the ProductVariant that you would like.
        Returns:
        The ProductVariant within the specified LineItem, or null if no associated variant was found.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        the number of LineItems contained in this Cart

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if the Cart has zero line items, false otherwise

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all line items from the cart.
